trans-unit.source: Represents the data contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.

The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has child objects.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> does not have child objects.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> can be resized.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.

Hides all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> does not contain any items.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.

Displays all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> does not contain any items.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.

Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.

Cycles through the checked states of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> cannot be checked.

Gets the checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.

The checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is virtualized.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not available.

Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> can be moved.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.

Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> can be resized.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> can be resized; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> can be rotated.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
In all cases.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> cannot be resized.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem"></xref> cannot be checked.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.
In all cases.
